name: Caprese Salad
ingredients: Tomatoes,Fresh Mozzarella,Basil Leaves,Extra Virgin Olive Oil,Balsamic Glaze
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate. Top with basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

name: Bruschetta
instructions: Toast sliced baguette. Mix diced tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, and balsamic glaze. Top baguette slices with the mixture.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Brown ground beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce. Serve over spaghetti. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.

name: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Beat eggs, milk, butter, and vanilla extract. Combine dry and wet ingredients. Bake in a greased pan.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss chopped romaine lettuce with croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine. Brown chicken breast. Add heavy cream, Parmesan cheese, and garlic. Toss with cooked pasta.

name: Apple Pie
instructions: Peel and slice apples. Mix with sugar, cinnamon, and flour. Fill pie crust. Dot with butter. Bake until golden brown.

name: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocado. Mix with diced tomato, onion, lime juice, cilantro, and salt.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry vegetables in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic until tender.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter, sugar, and eggs. Mix in flour, vanilla extract, and baking soda. Fold in chocolate chips. Bake until golden brown.
